raw_body: JAYASURIYA – IVAN (Retd. Deputy Commissioner,​ Educational Publications Dept.),​ dearly beloved husband of Princy,​ loving father of Jayani (Australia) and Prasad (Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority),​ father-in-law of Priyantha (Australia) and Shanika,​ grandfather of Nilesh and Sheneli (Australia),​ Rehan and Natasha,​ son of late Andrew Jayasuriya and late Elizabeth Perera,​ brother of late Bernard,​ late Beatrice,​ late Trixie,​ late Viola,​ late Rev. Fr. Luke,​ late Rev. Fr. Clyde and Claribel (Retd. Teacher,​ Convent of the Child Jesus,​ Ratnapura). Cortege leaves residence at “Jayamuthu”,​ Tudella Junction,​ Ja-ela at 3.30 p.m. on Sunday,​ 8th October 2023 for Burial at Kanuwana Roman Catholic Cemetery. Tel. 0112236280 /​ 0772267095.064186
